name: WizardWave
description:
Wizard Wave

2 player player screen wave based survival

Wizard Wave, you play as a powerful wizard and defeat hordes of the skeleton army along with your friend. multiple enemy types, potions to collect and use to defeat your foes.  can your survive the bullet hell all 10 waves of the skeleton horde?

NOTE:This game is still in development. the game will continually be updated on all released sites. if any bugs or problems are found, please send information at the email provided.                        any feedback or improvement ideas are greatly appreciated.

wizardwave.dev@gmail.com
